subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Mathematics
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Tim Chartier, a math professor, has picked 33 of 48 men’s games correctly, with help from his son. They have outdistanced a rotating cast of young Broadway stars, as well as coin flips.
snippet: Tim Chartier, a math professor, has picked 33 of 48 men’s games correctly, with help from his son. They have outdistanced a rotating cast of young Broadway stars, as well as coin flips.
